item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

*** Post - Christmas Celebration ***

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is:     The Avery Bar

Christmas is over, and should you be in town with friends and family, and maybe you need to get away for a little while from all the Christmas unwrapping and egg nog, then come on down and unwind.  JR has informed me that he will be open the day after Christmas! 

Touted as one of the best bars in Providence, The Avery has quite the mixed drink selection along with distinct craft beers.  It has never let this group down when it comes to MNM's.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Post Christmas Celebration at the Avery
